General.Name: Shandong Huifa Foodstuff Co
General.Description: Shandong Huifa Foodstuff Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of quick-frozen conditioning products in China and internationally. The company's products portfolio includes instant noodles, canned foods, self-heating, aquatic, shallow fried, dried vegetables fruit, rinse cook, prefabricated, and seasoned food products. Shandong Huifa Foodstuff Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Zhucheng, China.
